      • SimpleGui

         java.lang.String title,
         int slots)
        Creates an instance of a SimpleGui
        Parameters:
        player - - The player this gui is attached to
        title - - The title of the gui
        slots - - amount of availble slots in gui (must be a multiple of 9)
